Module core.java.helper
Package com.pineframework.core.helper

Class FileUtils

java.lang.Object
com.pineframework.core.helper.FileUtils
public final class FileUtils extends Object
The FileUtils class provides utility functions for files.
  • toPath(String)
  • toPackage(Path)
